mdRecord.dcterms:title: Kentuck harmony. Or, A choice collection of Psalm tunes, hymns and anthems: in three parts. : Taken from the most eminent authors, and well adapted to Christian churches, singing schools or private societies / Selected by Ananias Davisson
Choice collection of psalm tunes hymns and anthems
Kentucky harmony, or A choice collection of Psalm tunes, hymns and anthems
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Davisson, Ananias, 1780-1857
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed and sold by the Author, Harrisonburg Virginia. And sold by L. Trember Staunton, Jacob Bear Lexington, E.W. Robinson, Fincastle, A. North Lynchburg, J. Atkins, Charlottesville, Albert Waterman Middleburg, all in Virginia. In Tennessee, by J. Lynn Boatyard, Croster & Barton Knoxville, Robertson & Elliot Nashville. Ohio, Samuel Ethinger
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Signed and dated in print on p. [2] at end: Ananias Davisson. Davisson's Retirement, Nov. 2. 1826.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: M2116 .K4 1826: Original marbled boards, with sheep backstrip. Byrd Fund.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Another copy: M2116 .K4 1826b no.1: Imperfect: p. [1]-[4, 7-8 wanting; p. 5-6 used as pastedown, p. 6 visible; outer-half of p. 9-10 torn away. Contemporary sheep, with back cover wanting. "W.E. Jones" gilt stamped on front cover.First title in volume with: A supplement to the Kentucky harmony, 3rd ed. Harrisonburg, 18251 and Songs of Zion / adapted to divine worship by James P. Carrell. Harrisonburg, 1821. Robert and Virginia Tunstall Trust Fund, 2010/2011
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Hymns, English
Anthems
Shape-note hymnals
